feature.label: Prolog Development Tools
feature.description: The PDT is a Prolog IDE provided as a plug-in for the Eclipse Platform. All PDT features are implemented for SWI-Prolog, most also for Logtalk. All native SWI-Prolog development tools (graphical tracer / debugger, profiler, â€¦) can be used within the PDT. The PDT offers amongst other things: a Prolog Editor (with syntax highlighting, code completion, outline, breakpoints and more), a Prolog Console for interaction with multiple Prolog processes, a Context View visualizing call relations.
